name: Limbsnatcher
description:
You have no form.

We don’t necessarily know what you are to be honest.

Fortunately we do know that you need to move.

Fast.

We don’t see you and Them getting along well.

Thankfully you can’t speak with Them. Pushing seems easier. And look at their limbs… 

With a little help of spikes scattered across the compound They can definitely lend you a hand, or even two.

It will help you to get in shape just a little bit. Even better, it will enable you to get through different obstacles on your way.

What else can you snatch from them?

Legs?

Blades?

Use all of your cunning and lead them to their demise as you make your way through dangerous environments.

Make your way, make yourself!  

Authors:
Krzysztof Michniewski
Michał Pasiński
Mateusz Reczulski
